about.title: My passion is building cool websites.
content: Currently, I am studying Computer Programming at Izmir University of Economics and working as a fullstack software engineer at Mobility International I am learning new technologies and industry standards everyday.

about.title: Becoming a senior Full Stack engineer is my goal.
content: Studying and working at the same time leaves me little time. However, to achieve my goal I am trying my best to learn new technologies and build industry grade projects.

about.title: Currently, I am advancing in Frontend technologies.
content: Mainly I am using React, Typescript, Tanstack, Tailwindcss, and Framer Motion to build my websites. In the near future, I want to improve myself in UI design, animations and 3D modelling as well as using frameworks like Next.js and Astro.
When I am satisfied with my Frontend skills, I want to improve myself on Backend technologies and concepts.

about.title: I want to demonstrate my skills and abilities within your organization!
content: With a track record of delivering high-quality projects and a commitment to continuous improvement, I am eager to contribute to your team as a Junior Full Stack Engineer.
I am ready to collaborate, learn, and grow within your company's dynamic environment.
